scripts.bump-dependencies: TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.shared.json node --loader ts-node/esm scripts/bump-dependencies.ts css-loader style-loader
scripts.clean: lerna run --parallel --stream clean && lerna run --stream storybook-clean && yarn run website-clean && rm -rf '*.log'
scripts.fix: lerna run --parallel --stream fix && eslint --fix 'scripts/**/*.ts' && prettier --ignore-path lerna.json --loglevel error --write '*.json'
scripts.postinstall: simple-git-hooks && yarn run patch-figma-plugin-typings && yarn run build
scripts.publish: yarn run build && lerna publish from-package
scripts.reset: yarn run clean && lerna clean --yes && rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock && yarn install
scripts.website-build: yarn run website-clean && yarn run website-build-docs && yarn run website-build-storybook && cp packages/build/src/figma-plugin.json build
scripts.website-build-docs: yarn run generate-docs && single-page-markdown-website docs/index.md && TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.shared.json node --loader ts-node/esm scripts/check-html-anchor-links.ts build/index.html
scripts.website-build-storybook: lerna run --stream storybook-build && cpy packages/ui/build build/ui

simple-git-hooks.pre-push: yarn run lint && yarn run fix && yarn run test

single-page-markdown-website.title: Create Figma Plugin
single-page-markdown-website.description: A comprehensive toolkit for developing plugins for Figma and FigJam
